code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import PostThumb from"../PostThumb";import LoadIcon from"../../images/loading.gif";import LoadMoreBtn from"../LoadMoreBtn";import{getDataAPI}from"../../utils/fetchData";import{PROFILE_TYPES}from"../../redux/actions/profileAction";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Posts=_ref=>{let{auth,profile,dispatch,id}=_ref;const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[result,setResult]=useState(9);const[page,setPage]=useState(0);const[load,setLoad]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{profile.posts.forEach(data=>{if(data._id===id){setPosts(data.posts);setResult(data.result);setPage(data.page);}});},[profile.posts,id]);const handleLoadMore=async()=>{setLoad(true);const res=await getDataAPI(`user_posts/${id}?limit=${page*9}`,auth.token);const newData={...res.data,page:page+1,_id:id};dispatch({type:PROFILE_TYPES.UPDATE_POST,payload:newData});setLoad(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostThumb,{posts:posts,result:result}),load&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:LoadIcon,alt:"Loading...",className:"d-block mx-auto"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadMoreBtn,{result:result,page:page,load:load,handleLoadMore:handleLoadMore})]});};export default Posts;
